metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/CTY_Main_A- Talk to Civilian - S_LOW_CountingHouse_Civilian_02 cd8b2413-8448-43a7-bfeb-dfecb6e0751e - (-102; 9; -232)

0.speaker: Mevelenora
0.text: If you're wise, you'll withdraw everything and clear out before this army arrives. I'm not taking any chances.

1.speaker: Mevelenora
1.text: I've got a sister in Neverwinter. She'll welcome the help 'round the house - and the coin too, no doubt.
